description.TUEUR_EN_SERIE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9  You are §1Serial Killer§9. Your objective is to win on your own.
In order to do this, you will have 3 enchanted books : Sharpness III, Protection III and Power III.
When you kill someone, you receive an extra heart.
description.ANGE_GARDIEN: §6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Guardian Angel§9. You have to protect a player chosen randomly and win with them(or alone). If your protégé dies, you will loose your 2 extra hearts.
description.LOUP_AMNESIQUE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Amnesiac Wolf§9. Your objective is to kill the Villagers. 
In order to do this, you will have the following effects: Strength(night)  and Night Vision. After a kill, you will have Speed and 2 absorption hearts for 2 minutes. However, you do not have access at the Werewolf's list and the other wolves won't be able to see you in their list until you have killed a Villager.
Caution, you are not in the Werewolf's team until you have killed a Villager.
description.LOUP_GAROU:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Werewolf§9. Your objective is to kill the Villagers. 
In order to do this, you will have the following effects: Strength(night)  and Night Vision. After a kill, you will have Speed and 2 absorption hearts for 2 minutes. 
Use §b/lg ww§9 to see the Werewolf's list.
description.ENFANT_SAUVAGE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Wild Child§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves. 
When you will be shown your role, you will choose a master with §1/lg master§9. If they die, you will become a Werewolf.
description.SOEUR:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Sister§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves.
You have the effect Resistance when you are at less than 20 blocks away from one of your sister. When one of your sister dies, you will know her killer.
description.SORCIERE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Witch§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves.
In order to do this, you will receive 3 Instant Health potions, 3 Instant Damage potions and 1 Regeneration potion. Once during the game, you can resuscitate a player (or yourself if this option is enabled).
description.PETITE_FILLE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Little-Girl§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves. 
During nighttime, you can be invisible by removing your armor. But be ware, you will have blue particles behind you that the Mischievous Wolf can see.
Fortunately you can locate the Mischievous Wolf with their red particles.
description.TRUBLION:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Troublemaker§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves.
Once during the game, you can teleport a player randomly with §b/lg switch§9. When you die, all the players will be teleported all around the map.
description.CITOYEN:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Citizen§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves.
Once during the game, you will be able to look at the Votes, §b/lg countvotes§9, or cancel the Votes, §b/lg cancelvote§9.
description.ANGE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Angel§9. Your objective is to win on your own. You have 2 extra hearts. 
If you choose §1Guardian Angel§9, you will have to protect a player chosen randomly and win with them(or alone). If your protégé dies, you will loose your 2 extra hearts. If you choose §1Fallen Angel§9, you will be given a random target if you kill it, you will have 3 more extra hearts(15 hearts total).
description.RENARD:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Fox§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves. 
You will always have the effect Speed. You can smell the players with §b/lg smell§9 to know if they are Werewolves. The players need to be at less than 20 blocks away from yous. The time taken to smell a player will depend on the settings of the game.
description.MINEUR:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Miner§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves.
You have a diamond pickaxe and the effect Haste.
description.CORBEAU:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Raven§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves.
You will have the effect Nofall and your vote counts twice.
You can curse a player with §b/lg curse§9, he will receive the effect Jump Boost II for one day.
description.VILLAGEOIS:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Villager§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves.
You do not have any ability.
description.ASSASSIN:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Assassin§9. Your objective is to win on your own.
In order to do this, you will have 3 enchanted books : Sharpness III, Protection III and Power III. 
You will also have the effect Strength(daytime) and you have infiltred the Villager team.
description.LOUP_FEUTRE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Falsifier Wolf§9. Your objective is to kill the Villagers.
sYour display role(role seen if someone inspects you) is different everyday day it will be one role random among the ones still alive. Use this ability to trick the Villagers. You will have the following effects: Strength(night) and Night Vision. After a kill, you will have Speed and 2 absorption hearts for 2 minutes. 
Use §b/lg ww§9 to see the Werewolf's list.
description.VOLEUR:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Thief§9. At the beginning of the game, you are not in any team you are Neutral. 
 The first time you will kill a player, you will take their role and you will have to win with their team. You will have the effect Resistance before your first kill and the effect Speed and 2 absorption hearts 2 minutes after.
description.DETECTIVE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Detective§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves.
Each day, you can test 2 players with §b/lg inspect§9 to know if they are in the same team(Villagers, Werewolves or Neutrals). 
Be ware, the Assassin, the Thief(did not steal), the White Werewolf and the Amnesiac Wolf(not transformed) are all in the same team: Neutrals.
description.VILAIN_PETIT_LOUP:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Naughty Little Wolf§9. Your objective is to kill the Villagers. 
In order to do this, you will have the following effects: Strength(night), Night Vision and Speed. After a kill, you will have Speed and 2 absorption hearts for 2 minutes. 
Use §b/lg ww§9 to see the Werewolf's list.
description.VOYANTE_BAVARDE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Chatty Seer§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves. 
You receive 4 obsidians and 4 bookshelves. During daytime,you can know the team(Villagers, Werewolves or Neutrals) of a player with §b/lg see§9. 
However if it is a Villager, you loose 3 hearts. 
The team will be shown in the global chat.
description.INFECT:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Infect Father of the Wolves§9. Your objective is to kill the Villagers.
In order to do this, you will have the following effects: Strength(night)  and Night Vision. You can revive a player killed by Werewolves. This player will join your team, and will keep his original abilities. After a kill, you will have Speed and 2 absorption hearts for 2 minutes. 
Use §b/lg ww§9 to see the Werewolf's list.
description.VOYANTE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Seer§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves.
You receive 4 obsidians and 4 bookshelves. During daytime,you can know the team(Villagers, Werewolves or Neutrals) of a player with §b/lg see§9.
However if it is a Villager, you loose 3 hearts.
description.SALVATEUR:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Protector§9.Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves. 
You will receive 3 Instant Heal potions. Everyday, you can protect a player with §b/lg protect§9, this person will receive the following effects: Resistance and NoFall
description.MONTREUR_OURS:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Bear Trainer§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves. 
Every sunrise, you will growl if a Werewolf is at least than 50 blocks away from you. A message will be sent in the global chat.
description.ANGE_DECHU:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Fallen Angel§9. Your objective is to win on your own. 
You have 2 extra hearts. A target is randomly given to you, if you kill it, you will receive 3 extra hearts until the end of the game.
description.LOUP_GAROU_BLANC:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1White Werewolf§9. Your objective is to win on your own while being infiltrated in the Werewolf's team. 
In order to do this, you will have the following effects: Strength(night)  and Night Vision, as well as 5 extra hearts. After a kill, you will have Speed and 2 absorption hearts for 1 minute. 
Use §b/lg ww§9 to see the Werewolf's list.
description.CUPIDON:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Cupid§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves.
You can make 2 player fall in love with §b/lg lovers§9.
 You can win with the Lovers or with the Villagers.
description.FRERE_SIAMOIS:
§6LOUP-GAROU §7➽§9 You are §1Siamese Twin§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves. 
You have been separated from your brother at birth, however you have kept a strong link with him. You have 3 extra hearts but after your 5 first hearts the others  are shared.
description.COUPLE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§d You madly fall in love with §b%s.
If they die, you will kill yourself in despair.
description.LOUP_PERFIDE:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽§9 You are §1Mischievous Wolf§9. Your objective is to kill the Villagers. 
Unlike the Werewolves, you have the following effects: Invisibility(night) and Weakness(night). To receive the effects you will have to remove your armor. 
You will have red particles behind you while invisible. And you will be able to locate the Little-Girls vous pouvez repérer les Petites Filles with their blue particles. After a kill, you will have Speed and 2 absorption hearts for 2 minutes. 
Use §b/lg ww§9 to see the Werewolf's list.
description.ANCIEN:
§6WEREWOLF §7➽ §9 You are §1Elder§9. Your objective is to eliminate the Werewolves.
In order to do this, you have the effect Resistance and a second life.
You will loose your Resistance effect after your first death, but be ware, if a Villager kills you, you will loose 1/3 of your health.

powerUse.ANGE_GARDIEN: Your protégé was killed, you loose 2 hearts

powerHasBeenUse.VOYANTE: You spied on a member of the team §b%s
powerHasBeenUse.CUPIDON: The lovers you have chosen are §b%s§r and §b%s

translateTool.VICTORY_COUPLE: Lovers can only win with their lover
translateTool.COMPASS_MIDDLE: The compass targets the center of the map
translateTool.SHOW_ROLE_TO_DEATH: Show role when a player dies
translateTool.AUTO_REZ_INFECT: The infect father of wolves can infect himself
translateTool.VICTORY_NEUTRAL: Neutrals with the same role can win as a team

translateTimer.BORDER_DURATION: Time for borders to reduce by 100 blocks (§b%s§r)
translateTimer.MASTER_DURATION: Duration for the choice of a master (§b%s§r)
translateTimer.COUPLE_DURATION: Duration for the Lovers' choice and lovers' reveal (§b%s§r)
